thread.title: Behind-the-scenes snaps of Man United's wild celebrations as they equal Liverpool record
thread.title_full: Behind-the-scenes snaps of Man United's wild celebrations as they equal Liverpool record

title: Behind-the-scenes snaps of Man United's wild celebrations as they equal Liverpool record
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Behind-the-scenes snaps of Man United's wild celebrations as they equal Liverpool record MANCHESTER UNITED equalled Liverpool's record of 41 major trophies with their 3-2 win over Southampton in the EFL Cup final, and the Red Devils made sure to celebrate in style. PUBLISHED: 07:30,  55, Mon, Feb 27, 2017 Behind-the-scenes pictures as Man United celebrate EFL Cup final win Mon, February 27, 2017 Manchester United players went crazy in their Wembley dressing room after their 3-2 victory over Southampton in the EFL Cup final, having equalled Liverpool's record of 41 major trophies Man Utd via Getty Images 1 of 13 Manchester United stars enjoyed themselves after beating Southampton at Wembley 
Zlatan ibrahimovic was on target twice in the showpiece event at Wembley, while Jesse Lingard also got on the scoresheet as Jose Mourinho's men saw off Southampton . 
The Red Devils have now equalled Liverpool's major trophy tally, and can view themselves as the joint most successful club in England. 
Scroll through the gallery above to see the best behind-the-scenes snaps as United celebrate their EFL Cup final victory. Related articles
